column1: The Pit Room////I love BBQ and for that reason it's usually hard to try new places. I also am a competition BBQ cook which makes it even harder to eat " restaurant BBQ". With all that being said
column2: give these guys a shot. Their smoked turkey was hands down my favorite
column4: tender and flavorful. Ribs were good and tender as well
column5: my only knock on the place was the venison sausage. It's not that the sausage was bad
column6: it's that I believe it was leftover from the weekend and had been reheated
column7: it was sooooooo dry! All that being said next to Roegels
column8: this is my favorite joint in town. Authentic Texas BBQ with no fancy fluff!!
